content: this pattern is for the crochet poppy flower the flower petals are made in the shape of hearts as an example i ve made my poppies in two sizes use a larger poppy for various embellishments and a smaller poppy - to make a brooch or a pin the larger poppy is made using medium weight #4 yarn the smaller poppy is made using light weight #3 yarn larger poppy is about 4 in diameter smaller poppy is about 2-3/8 in diameter the pattern uses crochet us terms
